wikitext.*:
'''Robin Atkin Downes''' is a British actor.

He auditioned for the role of [[Aragorn]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]]. Atkin Downes was stated as trying out for the role but was not what the casting crew was looking for. He did  voice several characters in [[:Category:Games|video games]], but none of them were Aragorn.

==Roles==
* [[2006]] - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II: The Rise of the Witch-king]]'' - Additional voices
* 2006 - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II]]'' - Additional voices
* [[2003]] - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring]]'' - Elven Lightbearer, Additional voices
* 2003 - ''[[The Hobbit (2003 video game)|The Hobbit]]'' - Additional voices
